divs: Sighting Detailson the night of aug 10 1997 i was watching tv when the phone rang and it was my friend he told me to go outside and look up in the sky so i did and i was ashtonished at what i saw. this thing flew very close to the roof of my house i counted 13 individual lights on the bottom of this boomerang shaped triangular craft i could not even here its engines or any thing. i watched for a good fifteen minutes and then out of no where the craft took off at an incredible rate of speed after hovering. i dont know what to think of this?
Summary: trianglish boomerang 13 lights silent craft was huge
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Lubbock
There were no other sightings in Lubbock on or around August 10th 1997
